items/other/artifacts/caldosian_breastpl: A rare artifact. This magnificent breastplate is so ornate, it was likely used for ceremonial purposes.
items/other/artifacts/caldosian_drinking: A rare artifact. Drinking horns were usually passed down through the family line.
items/other/artifacts/caldosian_emperor_: An uncommon artifact. The bust of a Caldosian Emperor. It's not clear which one.
items/other/artifacts/caldosian_sword/de: An uncommon artifact. An imperial officer's sword from the early days of the Caldosian Empire.
